short_description: Innovative Industrial Design with Simulated Stitching: Features a magnetic head crafted with simulated stitching and premium leather texture embossing, delivering a rugged yet sophisticated industrial aesthetic that enhances your vehicle's interior.​

Strong Magnetic Hold with Included Metal Plates: Equipped with 6 high-grade magnets, this mount provides a secure grip when used with the included round or rectangular metal plates, ensuring your device stays in place even on rough roads.​

Easy One-Pull-Push Telescopic Arm: The adjustable telescopic arm extends from 4.6 to 6.29 inches and features our patent pending Easy One Pull-Push mechanism, allowing for effortless single-handed operation and optimal viewing angles.​

Industrial-Strength Suction Cup for Versatile Mounting: The heavy-duty suction cup adheres firmly to dashboards(use with 3M Pad) and windshields(use with UV reflective film), providing a stable and reliable hold across various surfaces.​

Broad Compatibility with Metal Plate Requirement: Compatible with most smartphones, including iPhone and Android devices. Note: This magnetic car mount requires the use of the included metal plates; it is not compatible with MagSafe or phones without a metal plate.

Installation Steps for the Metal Plate: 1-Stick the metal plate to the outside of the phone case. 2. Press down on the plate for 10 seconds to ensure a secure bond. 3. Wait for 24 hours to allow the adhesive to fully set before attaching the magnetic phone holder.
Note: Not for MagSafe. Wireless charging is not supported.
NOTE: DON'T USE THE EXTRA DASHBOARD PAD FOR WINDSHIELD/GLASS/WINDOW MOUNTING.
WARM TIPS: 3M PAD IS NOT FOR LEATHER AND SOFT MATERIAL DASHBOARDS.

Use of UV Film: If you plan to install the suction cup on the windshield, it is recommended to use a static film as an intermediate layer. This prevents adhesive residue from the suction cup on your car's glass surface, making future cleaning and removal easier.
